entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
